description:
The data broker industry is out of control, but that doesn't mean there isn't something we can do about it! ➡️ Remove your personal information from the web at https://JoinDeleteMe.com/techlore and use code TECHLORE for 20% off, or get one of their international plans if you're outside the US: https://international.joindeleteme.com

Today I am detailing the automatic and manual method available for people to take more ownership of their data and prevent their data from being freely sold & shared. We cover discovery, removal/deletion, and of course prevention. Massive thanks to DeleteMe for partnering with us to make this information more widely available!

Resources to dive into the journey ⬇️
Techlore resources & recommended services: https://techlore.tech/resources
Become anonymous guide: https://youtu.be/a1i-3xwcSGA
Go Incognito: https://www.techlore.tech/goincognito
DeleteMe: https://JoinDeleteMe.com/techlore
Have I Been Pwned: https://haveibeenpwned.com/
Big Ass Data Broker Opt-O
title: Data Brokers Are Stealing Your Data—Here’s How To Stop Them.
